title: Plat 4 Top main LF JG/Mid duo
body:
Hey guys looking for a duo to hit diamond + with before season ends. I'm pretty much a {{champion:120}} one trick and carry games frequently with him, although i have safe picks to fall back on and can comfortably play any role at this elo. Preferably looking for an Eve/rengar/shaco/ori main, but not required.

Requirements: Gold 1+, must be available from late evening to early morning most days (i play until ques are down) & must have skype/a mic.

Any offers would be appreciated, just add me on league :) .
